title: [Self-Directed] Workshop on Improving Language Teaching Methods Using Data-Driven Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning experience and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Course aimed at measuring students' language learning outcomes through learning analytics, providing data-driven personalized feedback, and establishing collaborative learning environments. Requires designing activities executable in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Derive three instructional design strategies to improve language learning outcomes by over 20% through learner data analysis
Design SNS-based collaborative learning activities to achieve learner interaction frequencies of at least five times per week
Generate learner-specific feedback reports using simple data visualization tools (smartphone apps)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
